Module kivakit.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource.packages

Interface PackageTrait

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
public interface PackageTrait extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater
A trait containing methods for working with packages. Classes implementing this interface are provided with easy access to packages and resources relative to the class' package:

Package Resources

  • packageResource(String) - Returns the Resource at the given path, relative to the package containing this class
  • packageResource(Class, String) - Returns the Resource at the given path, relative to the package containing the given class

Packages

  • packageForThis() - Returns the package containing this class
  • packageFor(Class) - Returns the Package containing the given class
  • packageForRelativePath(String) - Returns the package at the given path, relative to this package

Package Paths

  • packagePathForThis() - Returns the PackagePath to the package containing this class
  • packagePathFor(Class) - Returns the PackagePath of the package containing the given class
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
